content:
## Resilience Is What Remains When Optimization Fails

Most modern systems confuse efficiency with strength. This essay explores why optimization creates fragility, how resilience emerges only under constraint, and why the systems that survive are almost always the ones that look inefficient, redundant, or slowâ€”right up until the moment everything else breaks.

---

tags: ðŸ”’ Resilience Is What Remains When Optimization Fails

Most modern systems confuse efficiency with strength. This essay explores why optimization creates fragility, how resilience emerges only under constraint, and why the systems that survive are almost always the ones that look inefficient, redundant, or slowâ€”right up until the moment everything else breaks.
